adrFormatAddress: 11 Cornelia St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I planned my birthday with Josh from Birthdays and Bottles and I had such a great experience! It was so easy to go through this service. Josh reached out to me via email and asked what vibe I was looking for and made a great unique suggestion. I had about 40 people join me for my birthday and we had a section all to ourselves towards the back of the dance floor at a bar called Ms. Yoo. This was exactly what I was looking for, thank you Birthdays and bottles!

originalText.text: Absolutely phenomenal service!! Josh helped coordinate my 21st birthday party at Monarch and it was really perfect. They seem to have a great reputation with the venue because all the staff treated me and my friends like royalty for the night. They had saved us the best table and threw in a bottle of champagne as a birthday present! Josh was super accommodating and helpful. He kept in great communication with us and the venue so we didn't have to worry about it. And it was no extra charge!! Doesn't get any better than this. Definitely recommend!!

originalText.text: I used Birthdays and Bottles for my 25th Birthday at Monarch Rooftop. Everything was so easy and Josh was so nice and attentive via email. We got a great bottle special for the night and the views were just spectacular. My ~20 friends and I had an awesome time at this lounge and it was so stress-free because B&B did all the planning and reserving for me. I had Josh put me back on the guest list for Monarch the next weekend and I went back and had another great time! B&B is a great service and I'd recommend them to anyone who wants to have a stress-free and fun event!

originalText.text:
I found Birthdays and Bottles while looking through photos on Yelp from various venues throughout the city. At first I was pretty skeptical but after seeing only raving reviews I decided to send them an email.

I sent my inquiry late Sunday night (trying to plan for a party on Friday) and Josh got back to me on Monday morning! He was more than helpful with all of my questions about anything from venues to bottle service to getting in the door. He was always so quick to reply that I never felt forgotten about. Even after my group decided against a deal on bottle service, Josh never stopped being responsive and helpful. He added my name to the list at the door to make entry that much easier.

It was such a relief to know my birthday plans were in capable hands. The night couldn't have gone smoother. When I mentioned Birthdays and Bottles at the door, the bouncers knew exactly what I was talking about. The day of, Josh sent me the number of their off-site event manager to contact if I ran into any issues throughout the night but I never did!

I'm recommending Birthdays and Bottles to all of my friends anytime they are trying to set up a night out in the city. One of the best parts is that the service is free so there is really nothing to lose!

originalText.text: Birthdays and Bottles was great! They helped me plan my reservation at Monarch. Everything went smoothly and it was so simple. I didn't have any problems with the planning or the night of our party. Joshua is extremely nice, helpful and professional. I planned a birthday celebration for my best friend and got the buy one get one special on bottles. She loved the venue and had lots of fun!
